definition: Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God

to make clear/to make known/to state clearly/to indicate/known

sentences.chinese: 明朝由盛到衰的转折点是明神宗的统治。

sentences.english: The magnificent Ming and Qing palaces' pillars are red and the tiles are yellow.

sentences.english: The process reflected the complicated situations between Ming and North Yuan.
sentences.chinese: 这一过程反映了明与北元复杂的斗争形势。

sentences.english: In terms of architecture, the tangibility of this concept is palpable.
sentences.chinese: 就建筑而言，这一理念的确实性是极其明了的。
